frontendRules.description: Frontend development must use JavaScript with React 18.
Use Zustand for global state management.
Use Deck.gl built on MapLibre GL JS for primary map visualizations.
Leverage Deck.gl layers like HexagonLayer and ScatterplotLayer for visualizing data density and individual points.
Use Tailwind CSS for utility-first styling.
Utilize Material UI components for building the user interface elements (buttons, sliders, panels, etc.).
Implement interactive features like map brushing, temporal sliders (e.g., TimeSlider), tooltips, and detail panels.
Structure React application using functional components and hooks (e.g., `use-fetch-events.js`, `use-nlq-handler.js`).
Provide functionality to export visualized data or analysis results in standard formats like CSV and GeoJSON.
